ValidationRule.description: Checks if the mobile number is of 10 digits
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: LEN( MobilePhone ) > 10 || LEN( HomePhone ) > 10 || LEN( Phone ) > 10 || LEN( OtherPhone ) > 10 || LEN( AssistantPhone ) > 10
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Phone number can not more than 10 digits
